text: Sterling Sharpe is a current NFL Network analyst and former American football wide receiver for the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League. He had to stop playing due to injuries. Sharpe grew up poor and his brother is Shannon Sharpe, who gave Sterling one of his Super Bowl three rings. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Green Bay Packers players
title: Sterling Sharpe
